description: The City of Raleigh's fiscal year 2016 proposed revenue budget with fiscal year 2015 adopted budget as a comparison. The final adopted 2016 budget will be voted on in a June council meeting and posted at the beginning of July.

metadata.attribution: City of Raleigh Office of Management and Budget
